attributes.action: Make student loan repayments tax deductible
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Encouraging as many people to go to university is of benefit to the individual, the local economy and the national one too. Therefore, all viable steps should be taken in order to ensure as many people are, firstly able to attend university, and secondly not stricken with a large burden of debt post-graduation.

Making student loan repayments tax deductible is one such viable step that would help to lift this burden.
